GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.61 to before v5.15.68
GSD.description:
wifi: iwlegacy: 4965: corrected fix for potential off-by-one overflow in il4965_rs_fill_link_cmd()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.68 by commit 44b402da7b243ba41560577e84357226ed4a7778, it was introduced in version v5.15.61 by commit 88b551561ded10017dd846c8aeb2296a5119a915. For more details please see the references link.
